name: Pioneer: Endless Journey
summary:
Get ready to become a pioneer in endless journey!

Pioneer: Endless Journey is an FPS Roguelite game on a floating island in the sky. You can collect and combine weapon parts of pistol to create many various combinations. Some make each other explosively better, but some kill each other. You would need to try hard for the best combination. You can also throw orbs with special skill. There are some useful machines throughout the island. You even may be able to move forward avoiding all attacks with your...
